headline: Assessing Marriott International (MAR) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: What Marriott International (MAR) investors may want to watch now Marriott International (MAR) is back on many investors’ screens after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed short term returns but a stronger picture over the past year. With the shares last closing at US$319.70, and total return over the past 3 months and year both in positive territory, investors are weighing how that performance lines up with the company’s current fundamentals.
